title: gldman
author: gldman
content: Hi. I have two maple leaf 24k gold coins 1/10th and 1/20th of ounce. Selling two for 0.5 ETH or 0.038 BTC, free shipping using 1 day delivery service.Can get any upon request.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: gldman on September 04, 2023, 04:11:58 PMHi. I have two maple leaf 24k gold coins 1/10th and 1/20th of ounce. Selling two for 0.5 ETH or 0.038 BTC, free shipping using 1 day delivery service.Where does the gold come from? Do you ship it from Europe, USA, Asia ?..Also, do you accept the use of a well reputated forum escrow?

comments.author: gldman
comments.created_time: September 05, 2023, 06:16:00 PMLast edit: September 06, 2023, 01:33:45 PM by gldman
comments.body: Yes, I able to send it over the world and we can use the escrow service as well.PM me when interested.
